divs: Sighting Detailsjuly 4th party saw someone point to the sky. turned to look saw what I first thougt was a rocket launching. The funny thing was there was no fire tail or con trail & it was in the western sky. Rockets launch in the east. I turned my camera to it for about 30sec. then dismissed it as I don't know what. With camera running I walked over to people who also were watching it. They did not know what it was either. Someone said UFO I laughed & spun my camera back to the light. It appeared stationary still. I then turned my attention back to the fireworks. Later everyone I showed the video to said UFO. I am a professional cameraman & have lived in florida for over 30 years. I do not know what I saw but it was definatly unusual.
Summary: Fire ball rising & hovering in western sky.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in De Bary
There were no other sightings in De Bary on or around July 4th 2010
